text: Since I, the LORD, am the one who brought you up from the land of Egypt that I might be your God, you shall be holy, because I am holy.
Jediael, son of Shimri, and Joha, his brother, the Tizite;
The populace, one hundred and twenty thousand strong, massed in the center of the city in an attempt to kill the king.
Then one of the scholars of the law said to him in reply, “Teacher, by saying this you are insulting us too.”
Session of the Sanhedrin. Now many of the Jews who had come to Mary and seen what he had done began to believe in him.
